main.name: Mike Stagg
main.bio: Hi there! I am Mike Stagg! I've been coding for over 4 years now. I am a highly motivated React developer with a passion for creating user-friendly and efficient web applications. I am always learning, improving, and expanding my knowledge base. I am able to pick up new skills quickly, and I pay attention to trends and new technologies to stay on the cutting edge of the industry. I enjoy utilizing my technical skills and dedication to contribute to the success of dynamic development teams.

resume.skillmessage: Programming Languages, Technologies, and Other Skills:

work.title: IT-Manufacturing Support
work.description: Access, configuring, and troubleshooting BIOS, installing OS and booting devices from network, network port configuration, deploying and troubleshooting pipelines, identifying and patching ports on network switches, tracing and analyzing manufacturing line network drops, troubleshooting physical equipment and cables, PC hardware installation and upgrades, printer configuration and troubleshooting, installing standardized agents on manufacturing devices, initial configuration and troubleshooting of manufacturing devices via batch scripts. I also worked to develop and maintain in-house software tools.

work.title: IT/CS Teacher
work.description: Conducting one-on-one online tutoring sessions with students to assist them in comprehending computer science concepts and solving problems. Guiding students in completing assignments, projects, and coding exercises, offering constructive feedback and alternative approaches to problem-solving. Assisting students in developing and improving their programming skills by providing hands-on support and demonstrating best practices in coding. Teaching students how to debug programming errors and troubleshoot technical issues, ensuring they understand the underlying principles behind their code.

quotes.text: I am not a visionary. I'm an engineer. I'm happy with the people who are wandering around looking at the stars, but I am looking at the ground, and I want to fix the pothole before I fall in.
An idiot admires complexity, a genius admires simplicity, a physicist tries to make it simple, for an idiot anything the more complicated it is the more he will admire it.
quotes.user: Terry Davis, Creator of Temple OS
